News.headline: Barking & Dagenham College Academy Recruitment
News.short_description: The Barking and Dagenham College Academy are recruiting for the 2017/2018 season
News.description:
The Barking and Dagenham College Academy are recruiting for their Elite Team, for the 2017/2018 season.

The trial dates will be announced later this month. For information on about the recruitment and the trials please contact the college on joel.oliver@bdc.ac.uk or 020 3667 0294

The Barking and Dagenham College Elite Team are currently top of their league after 8 games and are still unbeaten this season, having won six games and drawn two games.

To see the full National League Youth Alliance League Table click here.
